word_mean: 比，比例，比率：一部分与另一部分或部分与整体的关系

sentence.Network_en: We must keep a sense of proportion about all this.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们对所有的这些都要有轻重缓急之分。

sentence.Network_en: A substantial proportion of the population speak a French-based patois.
sentence.Network_cn: 人口中有一大部分说以法语为基础的混合语。

sentence.Network_en: The proportion of women in the profession had risen to 17.3%.
sentence.Network_cn: 从事该职业的女性比例已升高到17.3%。

和Luke一起看新闻扩大词汇量_英语杂谈_天涯论坛 ... apart,adj， 分开，隔离 proportion,n， 比例，均衡，相称 compart,vt， 分割.

list.abs: 比例代表制(proportional representation): 基于各政党得选票数目而确定议会代表比例构成的政体。共和制(republic): 由民选代表负责.
中日会计用语 ... 所得税 incom tax 比例税 proportional tax 税前扣除 pre-tax deduction.
...外力作用，当应力不超过某一极限时，应力与应变成正比例关系，即遵从虎克定律，符合虎克定律的应力极限值，称为比例极限（proportional limit）。它是材料不偏离正比例应力-应变关系所能承受的最大应力。
PERCENTILE函数 - Sean的日志 - 网易博客 ... Infinite decimal 无穷小数 Inverse proportion 反比 Irrational number 无理数.

jx.jx_en_mean: according to a particular relationship in size, amount, or degree

lj.lj_ly: the pension was docked &B{in proportion to} earnings.
lj.lj_ls: 养老金是按照收入比例扣除的。

jx.jx_en_mean: in the wrong relation to the size, shape, or position of other things
jx.jx_cn_mean: （与他物的大小、形状、位置的关系）不成比例；不相称

lj.lj_ly: the sculpture seemed &B{out of proportion to} its surroundings.
lj.lj_ls: 这座雕塑似乎与周围环境不相称。

jx.jx_en_mean: the ability to judge the relative importance or seriousness of things
jx.jx_cn_mean: 区别轻重缓急的能力；分寸感；主次观念

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French, from Latin proportio(n-), from pro portione 'in respect of (its or a person's) share'

entry.def: A proportion of a group or an amount is a part of it.

example.ex: A large proportion of the dolphins in that area will eventually die...
example.tran: 那片区域里的很大一部分海豚终将死去。

example.ex: A proportion of the rent is met by the city council.
example.tran: 一部分租金由市政委员会支付。

entry.def: The proportion of one kind of person or thing in a group is the number of people or things of that kind compared to the total number of people or things in the group.

example.ex: The proportion of women in the profession had risen to 17.3%...
example.tran: 从事该职业的女性比例已升高到17.3%。

example.ex: The radio station has to include a substantial proportion of classical music.
example.tran: 该电台不得不播放大量的古典音乐。

entry.def: The proportion of one amount to another is the relationship between the two amounts in terms of how much there is of each thing.

example.ex: Women's bodies tend to have a higher proportion of fat to water.
example.tran: 女性的身体内脂肪与水分的比例往往更高。

entry.tran: （通常指极其巨大的事物的）大小，尺寸
entry.def: If you refer to the proportions of something, you are referring to its size, usually when this is extremely large.

example.ex: In the tropics plants grow to huge proportions.
example.tran: 在热带，植物会长得非常高大。

entry.tran: （艺术品或设计的各部分之间的）比例
entry.def: If you refer to the proportions in a work of art or design, you are referring to the relative sizes of its different parts.

example.ex: You can vary the relative proportions of things in a picture very simply.
example.tran: 你能很简单地改变一幅画中事物的相对比例。

entry.def: If one thing increases or decreases in proportion to another thing, it increases or decreases to the same degree as that thing.

example.ex: The pressure in the cylinders would go up  in proportion to the boiler pressure.
example.tran: 汽缸内的压力会随着汽锅压力的增加而相应增加。

entry.def: If something is small or large in proportion to something else, it is small or large when compared with that thing.

example.ex: Children tend to have relatively larger heads than adults in proportion to the rest of their body.
example.tran: 与成人相比，儿童头部占整个身体的比例相对较大。

entry.tran: 与…极不成比例；与…完全不相称
entry.def: If you say that something is out of all proportion to something else, you think that it is far greater or more serious than it should be.

example.ex: The punishment was out of all proportion to the crime.

entry.def: If you get something out of proportion, you think it is more important or worrying than it really is. If you keep something in proportion, you have a realistic view of how important it is.

example.ex: Everything just got blown out of proportion...
example.tran: 所有一切都变得不可收拾了。

example.ex: We've got to keep this in proportion.
example.tran: 我们应当正确对待这一点。

entry.tran: 区别轻重缓急的能力；分寸感；主次观念
entry.def: If someone has a sense of proportion, they know what is really important and what is not.

example.ex: We must not lose our sense of proportion.
example.tran: 我们不能丧失主次观念。

means.word_mean: 1. the quotient obtained when the magnitude of a part is divided by the magnitude of the whole
3. balance among the parts of something
4. harmonious arrangement or relation of parts or elements within a whole (as in a design);

sentences.sentence: "in all perfectly beautiful objects there is found the opposition of one part to another and a reciprocal balance"- John Ruskin
"harmonize a building with those surrounding it"

means.word_mean: 2. adjust in size relative to other things

auth_sentence.content: We also need to keep these figures in proportion.
auth_sentence.res_content: We also need to keep these figures in proportion.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We also need to keep these figures in proportion.

auth_sentence.content: So large a proportion of the earth's surface.
auth_sentence.res_content: So large a proportion of the earth's surface.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So large a proportion of the earth's surface.

auth_sentence.content: Workers are remunerated in strict proportion to their efficiency.
auth_sentence.res_content: Workers are remunerated in strict proportion to their efficiency.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Workers are remunerated in strict proportion to their efficiency.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 比例的, 成比例的, 相称的, 均衡的
stems_affixes.word_buile: proportion比例;均衡+al……的→adj.比例的, 成比例的, 相称的, 均衡的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 重要的, 重大的, 有权力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: import要旨,含意+ant……的→adj.重要的, 重大的, 有权力的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 轻便的,手提[式]的,可移动的
stems_affixes.word_buile: port拿,运+able能……的→adj.轻便的,手提[式]的,可移动的
dis不+proportion[n.比例;部分;均衡,相称]+al……的→adj.&n.不均衡, 不成比例 v.使不均衡, 使不对称

stems_affixes.value_cn: 按比例地, 相配合地;适当地
stems_affixes.word_buile: proportional比例的+ly表副词→adv.按比例地, 相配合地;适当地
port部分,分开+ion表名词→一部分
pro多+port部分,分开+ion→多个部分,每部分占用一定比例
comport[v.举止,行为]+ment表名词→n.举止
deport[v.驱逐出境]+ation表名词→n.移送,充军,放逐
de加强+port拿,运+ment表名词→一个人所拿[带的]的举止
ex出+port港口→出港口→出口
im进入+port港口→进港→进口,传达意义
import传达意义+ance表名词→带有意义的状态→重要性
port拿,运→拿或运东西的地方→港口,舱门
port拿,运+age费用→运费

stems_affixes.value_cn: 守门人,门房,行李搬运工,服务员
stems_affixes.word_buile: port拿,运+er人→n.守门人,门房,行李搬运工,服务员
port拿,运+folio树叶,页→拿树叶,书页的东西→文件夹
pur=per全部+port拿,运→全部拿到一起→要领,意义
s=dis+port传递→原为一种游戏
sport运动+s+man人→n.运动家, 冒险家

stems_affixes.value_cn: 运输;运输系统,运载工具
stems_affixes.word_buile: trans转移+port搬运→搬运转移→运输
transport运输,运送+ation表名词→n.运输,运送,客运
dis分开+port拿,运→拿来分心的东西→娱乐
ex出+port港口→出港口→出口
im进入+port港口→进港→进口,传达意义

stems_affixes.value_cn: 报告, 传说,报到, 告发
stems_affixes.word_buile: re回+port带→把[消息,情况]带回
ap成为+port部分,分开+ion表名词→把整体分成部分→分配

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使不均衡, 使不对称
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis不+proportion[n.比例;部分;均衡,相称]+al……的→adj.&n.不均衡, 不成比例 v.使不均衡, 使不对称
com共同+port拿,引申为动作→一个人的全部动作
de去掉+port拿,运→拿出去→放逐
sup下面+port带→带来支持
trans转移+port搬运→搬运转移→运输

Sentence.sentence: high schools was made this year, as in years past, according to a single metric, the proportion of students taking college-level exams.

In mature, fully developed countries such as the UK, more-efficient farming practices and better transport, storage and processing facilities ensure that a larger proportion of the food produced reaches markets and consumers.
Since 2003 the small, elite liberal arts school in Brunswick, Maine, has boosted the proportion of so-called under-represented minority students in entering freshman classes from 8% to 13%.
Last spring the school graduated the same proportion of minorities as it did whites

means.word_mean: 均衡; 相称, 协调

sentences.en: His success bore no proportion to his abilities.
sentences.cn: 他的成就与他的才能不相称。

means.word_mean: 一物与他物在数量、大小等方面的关系; 比例; 倍数关系

sentences.en: The proportion of imports to exports is worrying the government.
sentences.cn: 进口与出口的比例令政府担忧。

means.word_mean: 部分; 份儿; 份额

sentences.en: A large proportion of the children come to school by bus.
sentences.cn: 很大一部分儿童乘公共汽车上学。

sentences.en: The ransom must proportion the losses we have borne.
sentences.cn: 赎金必须相当于我们所遭受的损失。

jushi.english: A large proportion of my time is spent in studying.
jushi.chinese: 我的大部分时间用在学习上了。

jushi.english: The proportion of men to women in the population has changed in recent years.
jushi.chinese: 近几年男性同女性的比例有了改变。
